improvements: apply a slight vignette to draw focus to the center
remove the watermark in the bottom right corner
critiques.notes: The composition is interesting, but the image lacks strong contrast. Removing the watermark will also improve the overall presentation.

improvements: crop slightly tighter to eliminate distractions on the bottom right
critiques.notes: The photograph effectively uses silhouettes to create a striking composition, but the overall exposure is too dark, losing some of the detail in the scene. By increasing brightness and contrast, the photo will have more depth and impact. A tighter crop could also focus attention on the main subject.

improvements: Increase contrast by 15-20% to enhance the dramatic silhouette effect
Lift shadows slightly in the lower right corner to reveal more detail of the workers
Crop tighter from the bottom to reduce empty foreground space and strengthen composition
critiques.notes: Strong industrial documentary composition with excellent use of geometric framing and silhouettes. The dramatic angle and construction worker positioning create compelling visual tension, though the image could benefit from enhanced contrast and tighter cropping to maximize impact.

remove the watermark in the bottom right corner
crop slightly tighter to eliminate distractions on the bottom right
